prompt.subject: Galeborn skirmisher (weasel or stoat)
prompt.description: Small fast predator, anthropomorphic weasel/stoat, weathered leather armor, cold-adapted, menacing but not demonic, bone/iron dagger
prompt.faction: Galeborn - followers of Zephyros the storm hawk
prompt.style: Pixel art matching player style, cool grays and dark blues
prompt.layout: Row 1: Idle (4), Row 2: Walk (4), Row 3: Attack (4), Row 4: Hurt (2) + Death (2)
prompt.technical: Transparent PNG, side-view facing LEFT (opposite to player)

prompt.subject: Galeborn defender (badger or hedgehog with shield)
prompt.description: Slow armored defender, anthropomorphic badger/hedgehog, heavy round shield, mace or short sword, banded leather armor
prompt.style: Pixel art, bulky silhouette, intimidating stance
prompt.layout: Row 1: Idle with shield raised (4), Row 2: Slow advance (4), Row 3: Shield bash attack (4), Row 4: Stagger (2) + Collapse (2)

prompt.subject: Galeborn slinger (rat with sling)
prompt.description: Projectile thrower, anthropomorphic rat, leather hood, sling weapon with pouch of stones, nimble posture
prompt.style: Pixel art, sneaky silhouette, clear telegraph on ranged attack
prompt.layout: Row 1: Idle scanning (4), Row 2: Sidestep movement (4), Row 3: Wind-up + Release sling (4), Row 4: Flinch (2) + Fall (2)

prompt.subject: Galeborn scout (crow or bat)
prompt.description: Aerial enemy, anthropomorphic crow/raven, tattered cloak, sharp talons, wings spread in flight
prompt.faction: Galeborn - Zephyros's eyes in the sky
prompt.style: Pixel art, dynamic wing poses, threatening dive posture
prompt.layout: Row 1: Hovering flap cycle (4), Row 2: Glide/swoop (4), Row 3: Dive attack (4), Row 4: Hit recoil (2) + Spiral fall (2)
prompt.technical: Transparent PNG, angled view for aerial perspective

prompt.subject: Galeborn champion (armored fox or wolverine)
prompt.description: Miniboss enemy, anthropomorphic fox/wolverine, decorated armor with frost motifs, greatsword or polearm, imposing stance
prompt.style: Pixel art, larger and more detailed than regular enemies, regal menace
prompt.layout: Row 1: Commanding idle (4) + Weapon flourish (2), Row 2: Stalking advance (6), Row 3: Heavy swing combo (6), Row 4: Block (2) + Wounded retreat (2) + Defeat (2)
prompt.technical: Transparent PNG, side-view facing LEFT, more frames for complex attacks
